channel.title: [PI] Mage book glowing
channel.description:
Ok, so my problem is the spells in my mage book. So i have the rune requirments and everything but they dont glow, i have added the non glow sprites and also the glow sprites but it doesnt seem to work. Please help.
Thanks.
